text: Anthony James (born James Anthony; July 22, 1942 - May 26, 2020) was an American actor. He was known for playing villains in Western movies or television series. He was born in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina. His movie roles include: P.J. (1968) and ...tick...tick...tick... (1970). He played one of the lynch mobsters in High Plains Drifter and appeared the horror movie Burnt Offerings (1976). He had roles in Blue Thunder (1983), Nightmares (1983), and The Naked Gun 2Â½: The Smell of Fear (1991). James died on May 26, 2020 of cancer, aged 77. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Massachusetts Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American painters Category:Actors from South Carolina Category:People from Myrtle Beach, South Carolina
title: Anthony James (actor)
